In a device presenting an unbalanced (non-differential) input and output, the output signal is referred to the ground. The BALUN device obtains additionally at the second terminal of the output port (this is why it needs a differential port) a signal presenting the same characteristics of the signal present on the first terminal of the output port, but in opposition of phase w.r.t the signal at the first terminal.
